mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICES WHERE TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICES (title, content, visible, posted_at, expires_at, admin_id, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{visible}, #{postedAt}, #{expiresAt}, #{adminId}, NOW())
